About Us

A group fo ragtag college students were tasked to create a user-friendly web application for users to find and add podcast data. By collecting and storing user-inputted podcast data, users can search for, favorite, rate, and review podcasts. The application allows users to add data to our podcast database, allow for searching on this data, and displaying the results and providing recommendations to the user.
